attributes.additional_details:
The United Kingdon urgently needs to revise the Human rights legislation. When devised its intentions were honarable and well intentioned. It may be enshrined in E U Law. BUT THIS HAS TO CHANGE!
It has been hijacked by the Mad, Bad and Just plain dangerious! Not to mention hundreds of Lawyers.
NO Human rights to convicted criminals, illegal imigrants, or Social Security fraudsters.
Human rights for the right Humans please.
